description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Never played a good submarine game?  Ever thought 2D shooters are boring?  They don't have to be!  Battle Sub combines colourful artwork and compelling gameplay to create a unique experience in underwater combat.  Quests are the corner stone of this game, propelling the player forward in the story line as they help defend each ocean against the empire.
